title: Hash One Gaming - Master/Challenger Players - Competitive Ranked 5's - (Challenger 5v5)

embed.description: Beat the best, smash the rest!

body:
Hey there,

My name is Tom (or iPlayHeaps) and I'm the manager of Hash One Gaming. Right now, we're currently recruiting for our competitive league of legends teams on the oceanic server. we're looking for a few dedicated people who are wanting to improve their skill in a team environment, whilst competing in tournaments - both online and LAN.

As of now, we have three competitive teams who are eager for the season to start so that they may start aiming for the top 8 on the leaderboard. These teams are:
**Hash1 AlterEgo:** *Challenger*
**Hash1 Escape:** *Diamond 1*
**Hash1 Defiance:** *Diamond*

We're currently looking for:
**Hash1 AlterEgo:** *Challenger ADC/Support*
**Hash1 Escape:** *Diamond1+ Jungle/Top*
**Hash1 Defiance:** *Diamond3+ Top*

**As a recruit wanting to join Hash One Gaming, we'd expect you to be:**
*1. Dedicated to training at least 3 times per week
2. Non-Toxic
3. A mature player with a competitive drive
4. Diamond 1/Master/Challenger
5. Teamspeak3 and a working microphone*


If you think you'd fit the position, please add me ingame and fill out this quick form: http://hash1.pw/joinhash1
